document: <sentence id="s1" text="Overall, 40 of the 73 ICA patients (55%) and 23 of the 56 kindreds (41%) carry mutations located in translated or untranslated exons of li>RPSA. Eleven of the 43 kindreds affected by sporadic disease (26%) carry li>RPSA mutations, whereas 12 of the 13 multiplex kindreds (92%) carry li>RPSA mutations.">
